version_description:
Content now moves up when keyboard is displayed so it's not obscured by it.
Performance and stability improvements.

• Added more options for wheel spin time
• Fixed crash when touching empty wheel in wheel edit screen
• Fixed a bug where coins from daily spin were not always saved correctly
Fixed a bug where user was being erroneously asked for location services permission.

Spin The Wheel app 2.3.1 release:
• Chatrooms - you can now chat with other people spinning the same wheel and see other users' spin results!
• Search - you can now search the Wheel Store for wheels.
• Performance - improved app performance while spinning wheels.

Spin The Wheel app 2.3.2 release:
• Chatrooms - you can now chat with other people spinning the same wheel and see other users' spin results!
• Search - you can now search the Wheel Store for wheels.
• Performance - improved app performance while spinning wheels.

• Images on wheels - you can now add images to your wheels!
• Chatroom improvements - chat avatars and new features.
• Performance - improved app performance and responsiveness.

Version 2.4.0 release:
• Images on wheels - you can now add images to your wheels!
• Chatroom improvements - chat avatars and new features.
• Performance - improved app performance and responsiveness.

• Languages - added Spanish, Russian, French & Lithuanian translations.
• Sound - sound effects will not interrupt music now!
• Usability - improved app design, user experience & performance.
